In England, in the seven days to 29 October, there were 32,236 new confirmed cases (57.0 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 22 October, there were 47,467 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 32% (15,231 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 03 November is 20,206,637 (35,732.3 cases per 100,000 population).
